title: Fighting against animal abandon with an app bringing forward pet adoption
text: I built the back-end of an app with a whole social network feature, including an instant messaging and posting photos. I designed and developed the platform’s MVC architecture. For this student project, we deployed Scrum, and as the Product Owner of the project, I learnt to write a product backlog and to use many team management tools like Trello or Redmine.

title: Showcase my work and reveal my projects
text: I designed and developed this portfolio. I used this opportunity during my technology degree in multimedia to try new tools such as React, Tailwind CSS or Sass in a real project.

title: Show my academic and professional career
text: I built an interactive CV. If you want to work with me, it’s a place where you can get in touch with me. It was my first experience in developing a fully responsive website alone, and I learnt a lot in front-end development and positioning.

title: Demonstration : web color picker with sliders
text: I developed a small tool to explain how hexadecimal color codes work For a project in my second year of technology degree in multimedia. You can try it by yourself on my codepen page. Play with the sliders to understand how color codes work on the web.

title: Game development in d3js
text: I developed a Shoot 'Em Up game with d3.js. The goal is to aim the flames your dragon throws at knights. If you survive after level 3, you will have to face a boss ! Try it on desktop.

title: Find your way after your degree in multimedia
text:
In my first year of technology degree, we developed with a small team a website made to introduce occupations accessible after a degree in multimedia. We created all the website’s content, including video interviews and social media communication. 
 We learnt all the bases of project management and had to put in practice our knowledge in back-end development. The website was only made for desktop.

title: I made two documentary films about contemporary music
text: I made a first 30” documentary for a nonprofit organization in 2020, and a second 52” documentary for a music festival in 2021. For the first one, I was responsible for filming as well as editing the movie, and for the second one I was mostly responsible for the editing, but also shot some B-roll footage. They have been projected in festivals and the first one is already available online.

title: I make video recordings and livestreamings for events
text: I am working as a freelance to record and livestream corporate events, shows or concerts. Don't hesitate to get in touch with me on LinkedIn !

title: I made video recordings of a show for a students organization
text: I started to make videos back in 2013. As a musician, I was soon asked by friends and acquaintances to record concerts. Since 2016, I have recorded dozens of concerts and shows. I worked for 3 years for the students organization of my high school to record an annual show. I recorded the show with a team of 4, and edited a 2 hours long multicam recording.

title: I made an original video CV to introduce myself
text: I created a video CV to help me find internships and college for my second year of technology degree in multimedia. To stand out, I tried to introduce myself differently, highlighting my fields of expertise.

title: I made a motion design to raise awareness about animal abandon
text: I created a motion design for my project Zoey in my second year of technology degree in multimedia. I wrote an article on animal abandonment in France, to sensibilize on the necessity of adopting pets, and I wanted to illustrate my research with a motion design, to explain the issue about abandonment.

title: Nature and architecture photography
text: I started photography very young, and I soon became interested in nature photography and urban or architecture photography. In 2014, I began posting regularly my creations on Instagram. I’ve even been posting one photo a day for several years. I was regularly taking long walks across Paris to take pictures of the city, in known as well as unknown places. I made different photographic series, long exposures, and timelapses. My last series - not published yet - are about plane photography.
